sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PPSD SET PPSD.Version = #newTVersion#+1 FROM Basis.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluDetail PPSD JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSolu PPS ON PPS.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID = PPSD.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID WHERE PPS.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND (
EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM Basis.BIN_Product WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ( SellStartDate = DATEADD(day,1,#priceDate#) OR SellStartDate = DATEADD(day,0,#priceDate#) OR SellStartDate = DATEADD(day,-1,#priceDate#) OR SellEndDate = DATEADD(day,1,#priceDate#) OR SellEndDate = DATEADD(day,0,#priceDate#) OR SellEndDate = DATEADD(day,-1,#priceDate#) ) AND PPSD.BIN_ProductID = BIN_ProductID ) )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT C.BrandCode, PSDR.DepartCode, PPS.SpecialOfferSoluCode, PSDR.Version, O.ValidFlag AS cntValidFlag, PSDR.ValidFlag AS psdValidFlag, PPS.ValidFlag AS ppsValidFlag, convert(varchar(30),PPS.SpecialOfferSoluStartDate,120) AS BeginTime, convert(varchar(30),PPS.SpecialOfferSoluEndDate,120) AS EndTime
FROM Basis.BIN_PrtSpecialOfferSoluDepartRelation PSDR WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.DepartCode = PSDR.DepartCode JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(PSDR.BIN_BrandInfoID = C.BIN_BrandInfoID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSolu PPS WITH(NOLOCK) ON PPS.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID = PSDR.BIN_SpecialOfferSolutionId WHERE O.Type = '4' AND PSDR.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND PSDR.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND PSDR.Version > #tVersion#

SELECT DISTINCT C.BrandCode, S.SpecialOfferSoluCode, PV.BIN_ProductVendorID, PV.BarCode, P.UnitCode, PPSD.SpecialOfferSalePrice, PPSD.SpecialOfferMemPrice, PPSD.SpecialOfferPlatinumPrice, PPSD.Version,
PPSD.ValidFlag AS soluPrtValidFlag, PV.ValidFlag AS prtVendorValidFlag, PPSD.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluDetailID AS productSpecialOfferSoluDetailID, PPSD.BIN_ProductID, PPSD.SpecialOfferStartDate, PPSD.SpecialOfferEndDate, ISNULL(P.Status,'E') AS prtStatus,
CASE WHEN (P.SellStartDate IS NOT NULL AND P.SellEndDate IS NULL AND #priceDate# >= P.SellStartDate) OR (P.SellEndDate IS NOT NULL AND P.SellStartDate IS NULL AND #priceDate# <= P.SellEndDate) OR (P.SellStartDate IS NOT NULL AND P.SellEndDate IS NOT NULL AND P.SellStartDate <= #priceDate# AND #priceDate# <= P.SellEndDate) OR (P.SellStartDate IS NULL AND P.SellEndDate IS NULL) THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS prtSellDateFlag
FROM Basis.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluDetail PPSD WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSolu S WITH(NOLOCK) ON S.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID = PPSD.BIN_ProductSpecialOfferSoluID JOIN Basis.BIN_Product P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.BIN_ProductID = PPSD.BIN_ProductID JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(P.BIN_BrandInfoID = C.BIN_BrandInfoID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor PV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PV.BIN_ProductID = PPSD.BIN_ProductID WHERE S.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND S.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND PPSD.Version > #tVersion#
